item.title: Git
item.description: git 一些实用的做法 长期更新 git branch -r git branch --track [branch] [remote-branch] git branch --set-upstream [branch] [remote-branch] # 删除分支 # delete branch locally git branch -d localBranchName # delete branch remotely git push origin --delete remoteBranchName # 删除分支 git push origin :branch-name # 删除远程分支 $ git push origin --delete [branch-name] $
